transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji sir, main ye bata raha tha ki apne paas se na jaise business online kaise milte hai IndiaMART se, sir main aapko bata raha tha. Ek apne ko na sir direct call aati hai, theek hai? Jinki requirement hoti hai to jo buyer hote hai na to wo aapko direct call karte hai, sir ko direct call aayegi. Ek aati hai direct inquiries jo hamare matlab IndiaMART ke app pe dikhti hai ya system pe bhi dikhti hai. Aur teesri cheez buylead hoti hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Buylead means kya hota hai sir ki jo bhi hamare buyer hote hai na wo apni requirement dalte hai IndiaMART pe, theek hai? To aap unko dekhte hai to unko aap directly connect karte hai. To teen sources ho gaye, chautha ho gaya apna catalog jaise apna profile bana hua hai IndiaMART pe Vishal Murti Pooja Bhandar ki, theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To jo bhi aapki profile catalog ko dekhte hai to hum unko bhi jod sakte hai, unse bhi hum baat cheet kar sakte hai business ko leke.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? To is tarike se use karna hai. Kuch cheezein aur aapko aur bhi bata de raha hu kaise kya. Daily jaise WhatsApp aap daily basis pe use karte hai na?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: To sir ke mobile mein bhi IndiaMART ka app hoga. Dekhiye IndiaMART ka app ek baar open kariye aap.
Customer: Haan. Phone mein IndiaMART ka app. Ji.
Executive: Haan, phone mein dekhiye hoga. Main aapko ek baar bata dunga na aapko acche se call pe to aap na ek baar inko sir ko bata denge.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: App open kariye sir.
Customer: Maine app open kar, open kar liya sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Upar pe left hand side pe dekhiye sir upar pe top pe teen line hongi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Left hand side pe. Uspe click kariye sir.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Pehla dekhiye aapko waha pe lead manager dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Hmm. Yaha par dikh raha hai latest buyleads.
Executive: Haan, uske upar mein lead manager dikh raha hoga aapko dekhiye.
Customer: Lead manager to nahi hai. Haan haan, lead manager hai. Okay, theek hai.
Executive: Isme aap inko ye batayega lead manager daily open karna hai. Ispe na direct inquiry aati hai sir. Direct.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Matlab kisi ne apni requirement dali, theek hai? Aapki inquiry aa gayi. To aap yaha se unko call message kar sakte hai directly.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Lead manager pe. Ab dusra dekhiye uske baad mein latest buylead hoga.
Customer: Haan, latest buyleads hai.
Executive: Theek hai, ye sab buylead wo hoti hai, hame week ki 17 buylead milti hai, theek hai? Means hafte ki 10 milti hai, daily ki ek milti hai. Total 17 milti hai. Buylead pe jaaiye aap.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Buylead par gaya main. Theek hai, buylead pe aap gaye. Waha pe dekhiye ek abhi aayi hai. Aapko buylead ek dikh rahi hogi.
Customer: Brass Ganesha statue karke dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Yes, yes.
Executive: Theek hai? To ye jo contact buyer now pe aata hai na agar aap ispe jab click karenge, abhi main aapko sirf bata raha hu. Jab aap ispe click karenge na to aapka ek buylead ka balance khatam ho jayega.
Customer: Okay. Ye contact buyer now ka aata hai ki unhone bhai apni requirement IndiaMART pe dali hai. Aap apna dekha ki bhai hamara product relevant hai aur inki requirement theek hai aur hum isko de sakte hai. To aapne contact buyer now pe click karke unko directly call kar liya. Ab jo bhi aap buylead use karenge na sir yaha se ye agar aap suppose call us time pe nahi kar paaye to aap lead manager pe jaake bhi check kar sakte hai.
Customer: Accha aur phir jaise again inhe call karna hoga.
Executive: Lead manager pe jaaiye.
Customer: Accha again lead manager par hi jaate hai. Haan lead manager pe jaaiye aur inko WhatsApp pe message bhi bhej sakte hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap haan ye matlab mushkil se aapko jitni thoda sa long process lag raha hai, mushkil se bata de aapko jaise WhatsApp mein din bhar hum log WhatsApp, Facebook chalaya karte hai.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: To us tarike se hai ki daily subah uthe sir ko bolna ki apna IndiaMART open kiya buylead mein check kare acche ye mere kaam ki buylead hai. Contact buyer now kiya usi time mein direct usko call kar diya. Lead manager pe gaye, accha ye inquiry is inquiry pe reply kar diya apna catalog wagera bhej diya. Mushkil se 5-10 minute ka kaam hai. To uspe hamara us tarike se ho jata hai.
Customer: Ho jata hai.
Executive: Aur ek waha pe aapko feature aur dikh raha hoga. Aap wahi pe phir se three lines pe aaiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Three lines pe aane ke baad mein aapko waha pe sabse last mein dekhiye catalog view dikh raha hoga. Jaha pe lead manager, latest buylead karke tha.
Customer: Haan haan. Hai catalog view. Ji ji, ye catalog view chautha source aisa hai ki aapka jo bhi catalog ko dekh- dekhta hai, theek hai? Suppose koi bhi customer aapke catalog ko dekha sir minimum hum matlab 5-10 minute to diya hi hoga usne catalog mein agar interested hoga.
Customer: Ji ji. To to yaha se unko matlab call kar sakte hai. Ki agar unhone catalog interest dikhaya hai kehne ka matlab unse relevant hoga. To ye aap yaha se unko ek tarike se unko yaha se bhi call kar sakte hai. To ye bhi ek buylead ke buylead ke roop mein balance use kar sakte hai isme. Aur ye matlab ye is tarike se use karna. Chautha aapko dekhiye waha manage product dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Manage product mein aaiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Manage product mein waha pe hamare numbers of product dikh rahe honge.
Customer: Okay, haan.
Executive: To product mein kya hota hai sir ki hamara har ek product na har ek product ki detail update honi chahiye. Ab ab suppose aap kahi bhi online platform mein aap bhi shopping wagera karte honge na Amazon, Flipkart sab mein karte honge. To jiski aap cheez dekhte honge details acche se likhi hui hoti hongi na to wo upar top pe dikhati hai aur shayad aap usi ko lena bhi pasand karte honge.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Haan ab jaise sir ke uspe matlab kya hai catalog mein products ki detail update nahi hai. To uspe kahi na kahi interest kam hoga agar buyer dekhega bhi na. Ab jaise yaha pe single brass gold karke hai apna product iski photo nahi hai sir yaha pe.
Customer: Nahi mere paas to photos show ho rahi hai, brass gold sword.
Executive: Sir minimum yaha pe teen photo dala hota. Aap waha pe brass gold ki dekh rahe honge usko aapko 65 dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Matlab aapko isko 65 dikh raha hoga. Matlab iska jitna score hum accha rakhenge. Ji jaise yaha jaise yaha pe yaha iski product ki photo missing hai, specification nahi hai aur jaise sir sir 16 product ki na apna specification yaha pe nahi hai, 16 product ki.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Matlab brass lord Ganesha karke hai na sir to na iska height hai, na iska style hai, na yaha pe weight hai, na material hai, na manufacturing hai matlab kuch bhi yaha details hi nahi pada hua hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Iska matlab isme details nahi hai, isi wajah se 24% scoring kar rahi hai.
Executive: Ya yes sir exactly wo uska score isiliye increase ho raha hai. Kyunki usme koi detail hi nahi hai ab wo online koi bhi dekhega to waha pe visible hi nahi hogi. Kaisa style hai. Ji just one minute. Actually to be frank with you that kitne percent score se matlab customer reduce karte hai? At least jaise utna score to utna percent phir hum maintain karke rakhni chahiye isme.
Executive: Sir minimum aap isko 90 plus rakhiye. Jitna accha profile rahega utna more visible hoga. Aap score pe click karenge na to dekhiye isme pehli cheez to teen photo chahiye. Theek? Okay. Rate hamara pada hona chahiye, price pada hona chahiye. Agar in case product ka video hai to video dal sakte hai. Theek hai? Ji. Product ka PDF broucher wagera dal sakte hai isme. Apna specification dal sakte hai. To ye puri update detail ho jayengi. To agar hum apni city mein suppose Mathura mein agar hum dekhenge na to apna product waha pe visible rahega.
Customer: Okay, okay. Haan to is tarike se agar aapko thoda sa isme matlab aapko iske important agar aap video meeting ke liye bhi time ho video meeting mein agar abhi ek baar aa jayenge na sir video meeting pe to main aapko sari cheeze abhi dikha dunga just. To aap kab available hai video meeting ke liye? Abhi abhi aap abhi chalo ab main aapko abhi dikha de raha hu. To aap kisi product ki listing karke dikhayenge aap mujhe?
Executive: Main aapko matlab do teen product ka dikha dunga details kaise fill karni hai matlab at least uski importance kya hai ye main aapko dikha dunga uspe. Theek hai aap dikha dijiye. Main isi same number pe matlab link share kar du aapko sir? Haan link share kar dijiye. Theek hai, theek hai. Ji okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know how to get business online.

- Needs guidance on using IndiaMART app features.

- Catalog product details are not updated.



Resolution:

- Explained how to get business online.

- Explained about buyleads, direct inquiries, catalog.

- Explained how to use lead manager and buyleads.

- Explained the importance of updating product details.

- Agreed to a video meeting to demonstrate product listing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a link for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product details, app features
